summary: The escapades of a young hitchhiker who is picked up by an American tourist group comprised of very diverse characters.
cast: Lino Capolicchio|Janet Agren|Eugene Walter|Jeff Morrow|Umberto D'Orsi|Antonio Cesare Corti|Giovanni Gianfelice|Claudio Trionfi|Sergio Serafini|Pippo Franco|Dana Ghia|Gino Santercole
title: Il giovane normale
